DOC.detailed_description: The study include distressed patient ulcerous colitis Crohn 's disease relapse endure activity last 18 month simple activity index ≥4 , stable medication last 4 week . All patient follow gastroenterologist baseline , 3 , 6 , 12 18 month follow psychiatrist clinical psychologist 18 month . Half patient receive additional psychosocial intervention ( education , relaxation , supportive psychotherapy stress management ) . Assessments include gastrointestinal assessment ; blood test ; psychiatric evaluation psychometric evaluation .
